Package com.intellij.formatting

Interface FormattingModelBuilderEx

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FormattingModelBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JavaFormattingModelBuilder, PythonFormattingModelBuilder, RestFormattingModelBuilder

    public interface FormattingModelBuilderEx
extends FormattingModelBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • createModel

        FormattingModel createModel(PsiElement element,
                            CodeStyleSettings settings,
                            FormattingMode mode)
        Requests building the formatting model for a section of the file containing the specified PSI element and its children.
        Parameters:
        element - the top element for which formatting is requested.
        settings - the code style settings used for formatting.
        mode - formatting mode
        Returns:
        the formatting model for the file.
        See Also:
        createModel(PsiElement, TextRange, CodeStyleSettings, FormattingMode)

      • createModel

        default FormattingModel createModel(PsiElement element,
                                    TextRange range,
                                    CodeStyleSettings settings,
                                    FormattingMode mode)
        Requests building the formatting model for a section of the file containing the specified PSI element and its children.
        Parameters:
        element - the top element for which formatting is requested.
        range - the range for which a model should be built.
        settings - the code style settings used for formatting.
        mode - formatting mode.
        Returns:
        the formatting model for the file.

      • getIndentOptionsToUse

        @Deprecated
CommonCodeStyleSettings.IndentOptions getIndentOptionsToUse(PsiFile file,
                                                            FormatTextRanges ranges,
                                                            CodeStyleSettings settings)
        Deprecated. Use FileIndentOptionsProvider instead.
        Allows to adjust indent options to used during performing formatting operation on the given ranges of the given file.

        Default algorithm is to query given settings for indent options using given file's language as a key.

        Parameters:
        file - target file which content is going to be reformatted
        ranges - given file's ranges to reformat
        settings - code style settings holder
        Returns:
        indent options to use for the target formatting operation (if any adjustment is required); null to trigger default algorithm usage
        See Also:
        FileIndentOptionsProvider
